attributes.action: Allow taxpayers to select, on a per-centage basis where their tax is allocated to fund say the NHS, Education, Defence etc.  This would be by a simple tick box excercise with your chosen per-centage expressed on your Annual Return.  You select where your tax is spent!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Essentially, this empowers the tax paying (and one would assume voting) public to choose where their tax is allocated.  This should be considered in the best interests of a true democracy. It would make the tax paying/voting public more part of politics in this country.  I would venture to suggest that it would encourage more people to complete their Annual Returns in the belief that they have some 'ownership' over the disbursement of their tax paid. More revenue for the HMRC and less chasing too! GET IT SPENT WHERE IT'S MEANT.
